text: May 16, 2018 / 6:40 PM / Updated 33 minutes ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 16 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 50 between Mumbai Indians and Kings XI Punjab on Wednesday at Mumbai, India Mumbai Indians win by 3 runs Mumbai Indians 1st innings Suryakumar Yadav c Lokesh Rahul b Andrew Tye 27 Evin Lewis b Andrew Tye 9 Ishan Kishan c Marcus Stoinis b Andrew Tye 20 Rohit Sharma c Yuvraj Singh b Ankit Rajpoot 6 Krunal Pandya c Ankit Rajpoot b Marcus Stoinis 32 Kieron Pollard c Aaron Finch b Ravichandran Ashwin 50 Hardik Pandya c Ravichandran Ashwin b Andrew Tye 9 Ben Cutting c Axar Patel b Ravichandran Ashwin 4 Mitchell McClenaghan Not Out 11 Mayank Markande Not Out 7 Extras 0b 5lb 1nb 0pen 5w 11 Total (20.0 overs) 186-8 Fall of Wickets : 1-37 Lewis, 2-59 Kishan, 3-59 Yadav, 4-71 Sharma, 5-136 Pandya, 6-152 Pollard, 7-160 Cutting, 8-170 Pandya Did Not Bat : Bumrah Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Ankit Rajpoot 4 0 46 1 11.50 2w Mohit Sharma 3 0 34 0 11.33 1w 1nb Andrew Tye 4 0 16 4 4.00 1w Axar Patel 3 0 24 0 8.00 1w Ravichandran Ashwin 3 0 18 2 6.00 Marcus Stoinis 3 0 43 1 14.33 Kings XI Punjab 1st innings Lokesh Rahul c Ben Cutting b Jasprit Bumrah 94 Chris Gayle c Ben Cutting b Mitchell McClenaghan 18 Aaron Finch c Hardik Pandya b Jasprit Bumrah 46 Marcus Stoinis c Ishan Kishan b Jasprit Bumrah 1 Axar Patel Not Out 10 Yuvraj Singh c Evin Lewis b Mitchell McClenaghan 1 Manoj Tiwary Not Out 4 Extras 2b 2lb 0nb 0pen 5w 9 Total (20.0 overs) 183-5 Fall of Wickets : 1-34 Gayle, 2-145 Finch, 3-149 Stoinis, 4-167 Rahul, 5-172 Singh Did Not Bat : Ashwin, Tye, Sharma, Rajpoot Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Mitchell McClenaghan 4 0 37 2 9.25 1w Jasprit Bumrah 4 0 15 3 3.75 1w Hardik Pandya 4 0 42 0 10.50 2w Krunal Pandya 4 0 36 0 9.00 Mayank Markande 3 0 34 0 11.33 1w Ben Cutting 1 0 15 0 15.00 Umpire Nitin Menon Umpire Marais Erasmus Video Yeshwant Barde Match Referee Javagal Srinath
